body: Can we make `insert_after` point to the point before the iterator node iterator's `begin()`? It's a cycle, so that should work fine, and would allow us to get rid of this conditional
body_html: Can we make insert_after point to the point before the iterator node iterator's begin()? It's a cycle, so that should work fine, and would allow us to get rid of this conditional
body_text: Can we make insert_after point to the point before the iterator node iterator's begin()? It's a cycle, so that should work fine, and would allow us to get rid of this conditional
